issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Sometimes, not sure how exactly to reproduce it, Studio would crash and not reopen with the error from the title.

In order to fix it I tried:

Deleting the Library/Saved Application State/com.appcelerator.studio (or whatever that folder is called): it worked once.
Re-installing Appcelerator Studio from scratch: utterly frustrating, I can't reinstall every day the software.
How can this be fixed?
fields.summary: AppceleratorStudio: WARNING: The Gestalt selector gestaltSystemVersion is returning 10.9.4 instead of 10.10.4. Use NSProcessInfo's operatingSystemVersion property to get correct system version number.

comments.body:
Hello,

Couldn't reproduce this issue. Please try to update to the latest build of the Studio. If you continue to get this error, please let us know the environment details so that we can try to reproduce it.

*Testing Environment:*
Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.3.0.201509031836
Appcelerator Command-Line Interface, version 5.0.0-50
OS X version: 10.9.5

*Steps to test*
1. Create a simple project.
2. Run the project.

*Result:* Project ran successfully without any warning and Studio didn't crash.
Thanks.
